bio: Recycles jokes like they're made out of plastic. He'll be here all week, folks.

soultimate.name: Millennium of Lame
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 70% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' speed is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: When HP falls to 0, will recover once only, at 1 HP.
skill.name: Endurance
